Exabeam | Bay Area, California | Full time | On site Seeking multiple positions:

Sr. Platform Engineer (San Mateo, CA)

You will be responsible for designing and implementing a brand new data processing system to detect advanced security threats using the latest stream processing and machine learning techniques. As part of the founding team you will have the opportunity to define and work in various areas of the platform including data ingestion, data processing, algorithm design, machine learning, reporting, visualization, etc. You will also have the opportunity to contribute to all aspects of product definition and system architecture.

Responsibilities: Design and develop various platform components using latest technologies and coding in Scala.

--------------------------------

Performance Engineer (San Mateo, CA)

As a Performance Engineer, you will have the opportunity to design and develop automated tests that will measure the performance, scalability and reliability of the Exabeam Big Data Security Analytics platform. You will play a key role in developing strategies, tools, processes, and frameworks to test individual modules, as well as the complete platform.

Responsibilities:

* Creatively design and develop infrastructure and automated tests that will measure the performance, scalability and reliability of our system.

* Analyze and provide guidance to improve the efficiency, reliability, and stability of the platform.
